## This Week's Sessions

### Tuesday, April 28: Final Presentations
Evaluation, Feedback, and Reflection

## Presentation Requirements

Each team will present their final project:

- **Working deployed application** (demo)
- **Architecture overview** and decisions
- **Technical challenges** and solutions
- **AI integration** demonstration
- **Lessons learned** and reflections
- **Q&A** session

## Presentation Format

- **Time:** 15-20 minutes per team
- **Format:** Demo + slides
- **Required attendees:** All team members

## Final Deliverables

::: {.callout-important}
**Due by April 28:**

- Working deployed application
- Technical documentation
- Architecture decision records
- Individual contribution summary
- Peer evaluations
:::

## Grading

| Criteria | Weight |
|----------|--------|
| System functionality | 30% |
